roomDesciption: Pan Pacific Sonargaon Dhaka in Bangladesh is a six minute walk from Bashundhara City Shopping Complex and a little over a mile from Bangladesh National Museum. The hotel offers guests in-room complimentary Wi-Fi and a beauty salon. The subdued rooms and suites with low-key decor include flat-screen TVs and en suite bathrooms. Some rooms add sitting areas and suites feature separate living rooms. A 24-hour room service is available. Club lounge rooms have lounge access. Amenities include an outdoor pool, a fitness center and a business center. There are also hot tubs and security staff. There are seven restaurants and bars, including one that offers Italian cuisine and a poolside cafe with barbeque. Pan Pacific Sonargaon Dhaka is a little over one mile from University of Dhaka, two miles from National Parliament House and nine miles from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.

Pamper yourself with onsite massages and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a 24-hour health club, an outdoor pool, and a steam room. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge).Grab a bite at one of the resort's 7 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Dhaka? This resort has 16512 square feet (1534 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Make yourself at home in one of the 304 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. The Radisson Blu Water Garden Hotel in Dhaka offers guests affordable accommodation with complimentary Wi-Fi Internet access. Air-conditioned rooms include private bathrooms, safety deposit boxes, electric kettles, showers, free toiletries, minibars, and TVs with satellite channels. Guests can request irons and ironing boards if they need one. The Radisson Blu Water Garden Hotel features an outdoor pool, a tour desk, fitness center, meeting facilities, a spa and wellness center and free parking. Guests can dine at any of the four on-site restaurants during their stay or stop by for refreshments at the two on-site bars. There are also shops, cafes and restaurants within steps of the property. The Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from the property. Lalbag Fort is a 45-minute drive from this hotel and the National Parliament is approximately 25 minutes away by car.
